evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs assert claims for violation of their rights to Equal Protection (Count I)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Due Process (Count II) under the U.S. Constitution

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: violation of the federal Rehabilitation Act, 29 U.S. C. § 794 (Count III)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Issue a declaratory judgment that the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11), including the categorical exclusion of surgical treatments for gender dysphoria, is unconstitutional and violates Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act

extracted.value: Declaratory judgment that the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11) is unconstitutional and violates Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Issue a permanent injunction prohibiting the Defendants, their agents, employees, representatives, contractors or any third party acting on their behalf from any enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11)

extracted.value: Permanent injunction prohibiting enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award Plaintiffs damages in an amount to be established at trial

extracted.value: Damages to be established at trial

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award Plaintiffs their reasonable attorneys’ fees, costs and expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1088 or other applicable statutes

extracted.value: Attorneys' fees, costs and expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1088 or other applicable statutes

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award any such other and further relief as this Court deems just and proper

extracted.value: Other relief as deemed just and proper
